unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist**

unnormalised: Hey folks! Tired of generic follower analytics? Well, get ready for a chai-spiced update! New tools are popping up that finally understand the Indian audience. Think beyond just likes - we're talking sentiment analysis tuned to *Hinglish* and regional languages!
normalised: Hey folks! Tired of generic follower analytics? Well, get ready for a chai-spiced update! New tools are popping up that finally understand the Indian audience. Think beyond just likes - we are talking sentiment analysis tuned to Hinglish and regional languages!

unnormalised: Imagine knowing exactly which *Bollywood* gossip is making your followers from Chennai tick, or which political meme resonates with Gen Z in Delhi. One new platform, "AnalyticsBaba," even claims to predict engagement based on upcoming festivals like Diwali (coming up on 12/11/2024!).
normalised: Imagine knowing exactly which Bollywood gossip is making your followers from Chennai tick, or which political meme resonates with G-e-n Z in Delhi. One new platform, "AnalyticsBaba," even claims to predict engagement based on upcoming festivals like Diwali (coming up on twelfth november two thousand and twenty four!).

unnormalised: Early adopters like lifestyle influencer, Priya Sharma from Mumbai, are raving. "My engagement went up by 20% after using these insights," she told us at 14:00 hrs yesterday. "I finally understand why my 'chai time' posts do better than my gym selfies!"
normalised: Early adopters like lifestyle influencer, Priya Sharma from Mumbai, are raving. "My engagement went up by twenty percent after using these insights," she told us at two P M yesterday. "I finally understand why my 'chai time' posts do better than my gym selfies!"

unnormalised: Analysts at IIM Ahmedabad are also reportedly studying the impact of these hyper-localized analytics. Looks like understanding your audience, especially in a diverse place like India, just got a whole lot easier. Get ready to dive deep – 09:00 hrs onwards, you’ll be checking those stats! Time to boost those engagement rates before the big festive season rush! Let's see if you can crack the code before *Laxmi Puja* on 13/11/2024.
